module.name: Bulk Handler
module.changelog: *13.0.11* Add fwconsole import. Update navigation. *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10241 better error reporting when files are invalid *13.0.9* FREEPBX-9952 Errors in Bulk Handler extension import/export *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9596 Add cancel option when importing in Bulk Handler *13.0.6* Require Asterisk to be running *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9712 add progress bar and use action bar *13.0.5* Fix invalid looping errors *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9594 slightly better name for exported file *13.0.3* Fixes to functionality *13.0.2* Initial release to the world!
